cause.description:
Please join my club. I am so sick of seeing and hearing Paris Hilton's name. She is not a celebrity and does nothing but make a scene. Please stop giving her fame when none is deserved. As for Julia Stiles....She just irritates the hell out of me and I don't think I am alone...Otherwise we would have seen her in more and better movies. Although her protrayal in "The Omen", namely her death...was spectacular. Make no mistake I wish her no harm.There is no charge and we will never ask for donations.
1. Julia Stiles is irritating!!!!!
2. Paris Hilton is NOT a celebrity!!!!
3. Paris Hilton and Julia Stiles should be ignored and removed from all media.
cause.mission: Stamp out any mention of them in the media!!
cause.name: I hate Julia Stiles and Pris Hilton!!
